statements: DELETE FROM wallet_payments WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM wallet_payments WHERE payment_id = 100 AND card_number = '1234-5678-9012';
DELETE FROM wallet_payments WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe' AND expiration_date = '2023-12-31';
DELETE FROM payment_cards WHERE expiry_date < '2022-01-01' AND cvv < 100
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount = 0.00 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM tokens WHERE expiration < NOW();
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM cards WHERE cvv = '123' OR card_number = '5555666677778888';
